100972P3.title: Parisian Life Style Private Photo Shoot at Eiffel Tower
100972P3.description:
Visiting Paris? 

Time to live the dream! 

Walk around the city with a local professional photographer and take home the best images of your amazing trip. In a 100% Parisian life style photo shooting, get to know Paris' highlights and secrets and keep your memories forever. 
 • 1h photo shooting with local professional photographer 
 • 50-80 high resolution EDITED photos sent by mail after the shooting 
 • groups up to ten people! 
 • Ideal for celebrating your honeymoon, engagement photos, bachelor party, family trip, birthdays and more 
 • props included for kids 
 • kids friendly activity 
 • fun, local and 100% passionate photographers!

NOTE: you will be booked in the first available hour. You will receive an email about your tour hour, meeting point and recognizing your photographer within 7 days of booking. Please check your spam and contact with us if you have not received it.

40711P1.title: Paris Highlights: Half Day Private Walking Tour
40711P1.description: A perfect introduction to the City of Lights! Meet the city's legacy by exploring the grand monuments that make Paris such a desirable destination - from the Louvre to the Iron Lady herself and everything in between!

63697P1.title: Semi-Private Louvre Masterpieces with Reserved Entrance Time
63697P1.description: With a maximum of six people per group, you are guaranteed a nearly private experience! Whether it is your first or one hundredth visit to the Louvre, there is something for everyone on this exclusive tour.  Your expert guide will lead you through the museum as you visit the Louvre’s must-sees.  Marvel at masterpieces in the Louvre’s most significant collections from Mesopotamia to French Romanticism, including, of course, the Mona Lisa, the Venus de Milo, and Winged Victory.

6353P18.title: Paris City Center "History of Paris" Guided Walking Tour - Semi-Private 8ppl Max
6353P18.description: on this 2.5 hour intimate Semi-Private (8 Guest Maximum) guided tou of central Paris, Become a true flâneur – French for someone who enjoys a good stroll – Our expert guides will take show you all of the highlights including the Notre Dame Cathedral and the Tuileries Garden while ending where the guillotine once stood at the base of the world’s most famous avenue, the Champs Elysées. There will be time for a snack and restroom break during the walk.

129335P2.title: Montmartre/Sacre-Coeur/Paris- Artistic & Bohemian Epicenter
129335P2.description:
You will follow a highly attractive itinerary including history and stories, architecture, street art, local food stores, artists at work in the lively Place de Tertre, walking in the calm cobbled old streets uphill to reach the imposing Basilica of Sacre – Coeur, with a breathtaking panorama view upon the city of Paris.

Your walking tour covers must-see spot as well as hidden treasures of Montmartre Village, walking in the footsteps of the impressionist artists who were inspired by local sites. You see film shot spots of famous French ‘ Amelie of Montmartre’ and many more. You feel the vibes of the hip , artsy and historical Montmartre Village and its eclectic sites. Your tour is tailored to your interests and physical abilities 
 Note : private/ personalized tours possible on request- number of participants- unlimited
 Note: students & group of friends & team- building, special event in a group tours possible on request- number of participants- unlimited

40925P1.title: Great Women of History walking tour
40925P1.description: Join the first Paris walking tour devoted entirely to women's history and influence. Meet near the Luxembourg Gardens and take an inspirational 2-hour guided walk through the charming streets of the famous Left Bank, unraveling stories of incredible women at every turn.

6353P14.title: Latin Quarter Paris - Exclusive Guided Walking Tour
6353P14.description: With a exclusive guide, take a 2.5-hour walking tour of one of Paris’ oldest and most iconic neighborhoods—the Latin Quarter. You’ll start by the Notre-Dame Cathedral before making your way on foot to the playground of French students and the Lost Generation. Sights include the Panthéon and Luxembourg Garden. Select a morning or afternoon departure time when booking.

302088P2.title: First Entry Louvre Highlights Private Tour
302088P2.description:
Experience the Louvre like never before on our 3-hour private tour that starts at the earliest time possible. 

As you walk through the hallowed halls of this iconic museum, you'll see breathtaking masterpieces that are sure to dazzle your senses. Feast your eyes on the Mona Lisa's enigmatic smile, the Winged Victory of Samothrace's magnificent form, and the Venus de Milo's graceful beauty. 

As you take in these incredible works of art, you'll feel a sense of wonder and awe at the sheer scale and majesty of the Louvre's collection. You'll also get to touch history with your own hands as you explore the museum's exhibits up close and personal. 

With our expert guide by your side, you'll learn fascinating stories about the artists behind the works, and gain insights into the cultural significance of each piece. Join us on this unforgettable journey through the Louvre, and create memories that will last a lifetime.

342744P1.title: Photographer in Paris
342744P1.description: Hi! I m Nina :) 10 years of experience in photography and same living in Paris - great mix for an excellent photoshooting quality. And a bit of humor and love for meeting new people. I would be glad to meet your for a photo promenade :)

40711P2.title: Private Half Day Historic Tour
40711P2.description: Journey through time in the heart of historic Paris. Stroll through the different eras of Paris from Ancient Gaul to the Roman era and Middle Ages of the Left Bank. Crossing the Seine, you will discover Renaissance Paris and the Grand Siècle.

114983P1.title: Exclusive Champagne tour from Paris including 3 house visits
114983P1.description:
We created your dream Champagne tour from Paris

While crossing the country to Reims from our meeting point in Paris, your guide will share his passion and you will enjoy a nice complimentary breakfast

In Reims, you visit Champagne Mumm, with a full guided visit and a tasting of beautiful vintage. Then, we go to the Reims Cathedral, a UNESCO world heritage site, and have the opportunity to taste various local specialties

For lunch, we have selected an iconic restaurant built in the Art Deco style. The gourmet three course meal includes wine and coffee

After a short drive to Epernay you will visit the second house of Champagne. You will be here in the heart of the Champagne vineyards. You will have the chance to see the hidden secrets of cellars and taste Champagne

To finish the day, we will walk in the lovely village of Hautvillers, where Dom Perignon created Champagne more than 3 centuries ago. Here you will visit a third house, one of the oldest family-owned vineyard.

40925P3.title: Literary Women and Sweet Tastings walking tour
40925P3.description:
The first Paris walking tours devoted to women’s history and influence, Women of Paris offers tours that challenge the status quo by placing women at the heart of the Paris story. Since launching in 2016, Women of Paris has received lots of coverage in the French and international media and very positive reviews. 

This unique experience combines an exploration into women’s imprint on the literary world, as well as a bit of sugar and spice! We'll take a stroll through Saint Germain-des-Prés walking in the footsteps of female writers, examining the development of the Women's Liberation Movement in France and making 4 stops along the way to taste and learn about a selection of award winning French sweets and cakes. 

After all, it wouldn't be Paris without something delicious to eat..!

398994P1.title: Private photo session in Paris
398994P1.description: A short circuit but rather rich because it allows you to see the Eiffel Tower from a different point of view. This experience offers a short walk accompanied by a professional photographer to immortalize this dream moment

7842P4.title: Photography workshop in Paris
7842P4.description:
The City of Light has many secrets, sometimes unknown to locals. Discover the intimacy of neighborhoods in a city on the move where you won't know where to turn! These three hours of session will allow you to learn new photography techniques, encourage your creativity and develop your technical skills in order to be sure to capture the shot you so desire.

Whether you are a beginner, a seasoned amateur or have several years of experience, our team of professional photographers will allow you to take your photography skills to the next level. Our condensed sessions are unique and customizable to your interests and help develop your creative vision.

343759P2.title: Explore Paris in Half a Day: Custom Tour with Local Expert Guide!
343759P2.description:
Discover the best of Paris with a local guide who knows the city inside and out on this customizable tour. This tour is a perfect way to see the must-sees of Paris and also grasp the local culture.

Your guide is a local who will give you the unique perspective of a true Parisian, with an in-depth knowledge of the city's history and personal experiences of different neighborhoods. He has lived, studied, and worked in various areas and will share his personal insights and hidden gems with you.

We understand that every traveler has different interests and priorities, so once you book this tour, we will contact you to discuss what you want to see and do and craft the perfect itinerary that suits your preferences.

The sample itinerary shows what someone interested in a walking tour of the left bank could do during this tour.

images.caption: Notre-Dame and Latin Quarter Private Tour

14787P7.title: Paris 2-Hour Eiffel Tower Walking Tour with Professional Photo Shoot
14787P7.description:
What makes this tour unique is the excellent quality of the 300 pictures that are being taken. In different locations and backgrounds. Also the fact that all these pictures will be delivered retouched in terms of their exposure, saturation, sharpness, incorrections etc. and ready for immediate printing. The sending of the pictures is being made within 24 hours. But what mostly makes this session unique, is the wonderful smile, the warmth, the politeness, the humour and the patience of our experienced photographer Ari Bafalouka that speaks perfectly well English and French. 

No need to worry about snapping the perfect selfie in front of the Eiffel Tower when you can instead book a walking tour that includes a photo shoot by a professional photographer. During this 2-hour Paris experience, you'll explore the area around the Eiffel Tower while the photographer captures 300 artistic photos of you in front of the world-famous landmark. Retouching for all the pictures is included.

69148P1.title: Food tour Belleville Off the Beaten Path 10:30 am
69148P1.description:
Did you know that the selection of addresses for our Food tour is carefully prepared over several months?
- Meeting with producers/artisans
- Visit of the production workshops
Belleville is in the heart of the artistic village with a bohemian spirit..
Starting at the Jourdain church, this guided tour by an expert in French gastronomy will begin with a culinary discovery, at the highest point of Paris.
For three hours, meet passionate local artisans, the best in their field, and taste bread and croissant, iconic Parisian travel cake, chocolates, coffee, salame or oysters. 
On your way, settle down in a bistro for a cheese and wine pairing.Visit a baker's kitchen (according to the sanitary rules in force) Learn how to make a baguette and a real butter croissant. 
Many anecdotes will be told to you as well as our French gastronomic exception. Paris A Dream is a local company that has only one desire: to promote our French know-how and provide you with unforgettable experiences.

6353P19.title: Pere Lachaise Cemetery Guided Walking Tour - Semi-Private 8ppl Max
6353P19.description: Venture to the eastern Paris landmark on this 2.5-hour, semi-private (8 Guest Maximum) guided walking tour. With its cobblestone paths, centuries-old gravestones, and famous residents, Père Lachaise is one of the world’s great cemeteries. Discover the final resting places of luminaries ranging from Oscar Wilde to Jim Morrison, and soak up the evocative, unforgettable atmosphere.

6353ORSAY.title: Musée d'Orsay & Montmartre - Semi-Private 8ppl Max (Reserved Entry Included!)
6353ORSAY.description: This 5.5 hour semi-private (8 guest maximum) guided combo museum & walking tour explores origins of the Impressionist movement. Start at the Orsay Museum where you will enter directly into its main collection of artwork by the likes of Monet and Cezanne. Then head to the Montmartre neighborhood and experience the surrounding that is the background of the impressionist's lives. The tour can welcome up to 8 guests and includes transportation between the two locations.

19014P31.title: Experience Segway in Paris Small Group 2 Hours
19014P31.description:
Enjoy a beautiful hassle free experience around Paris with a local guide on a Segway! Have a private tour in the city with rich history at any time you want with your friends and family in a small group of only 8 people!

Discover Paris at a faster pace than a walking tour, and save tired legs, by choosing this fun option. Glide down the river bank, stop for photo opportunities of the Eiffel Tower, and the Louvre, and enjoy lots of entertaining commentary along the way. Ask our local guide for some tips in Paris after this ride so your adventure would continue!

131795P4.title: Paris Night Segway tour
131795P4.description: Segway tours are a unique way and the funniest way to discover the most beautiful sites in the historic center of Paris. If you have always dreamed of flying on a flying carpet, a Segway ride will fill you. You will slide over the ground and sneak in an instant wherever your heart tells you in the hectic streets of Paris, and your guide will show you the most beautiful places and sights of the city.

407072P1.title: Homemade and Easy Private Bike Tour in Paris
407072P1.description:
Hi ! I'm Cesar. When I was 8 I learnt the Paris map by heart. My family was a bit worried. Recently I decided to share this with new people. I’ve spent days working on the best possible bike itinerary. Found ! 

We will explore the Marais, where I used to go to high school, and the islands. We'll try to stay away from the crowds : I will take you through quiet streets, show you hidden places, & tell you about them. You'll learn how they looked like centuries ago. Bike is fun and gives you great energy. But no worries : my itinerary is safe & smooth and we’ll keep the pace you want. It's a 100% flat tour.

Available in French & English. Also available in Russian & Italian, if you are tolerant!

394285P7.title: Paris Electric Scooter Private Tour
394285P7.description:
The only way to start your Paris adventure is with an E-Scooter tour along the Seine river. Discover the city's most iconic sites & 2000-year history with your expert guide! 
This Paris E-Scooter tour covers the city's most important landmarks from Notre-Dame all the way to the Eiffel Tower, passing through the most important monuments Paris has to offer. 
Your guide will make sure you stop in the perfect spots so you can take amazing photographs and of course our guides will be very keen to take your pics with breathtaking Parisian views in the background. 
The route is very safe as we only use the legal bike and E-Scooter lanes of the city. 
This E-Scooter tour is a great way to get your bearings, take the most memorable pics of the city and learn about its history and monuments.
The finest way to discover Paris!

19014P35.title: E-Bike tour including VR experience
19014P35.description:
E-bike tour of the sights of Paris with a visit to the past with virtual reality glasses.

What’s awaits you.

A three-hour private tour with visits to sites such as Hotel des Invalides, Place de la Concorde, Louvre Museum, Arc de Triomphe de l'Étoile, Pont de l'Alma, Place Diana, Place Trocadero, Eiffel Tower, Champ de Mars, Military school.
During the tour, you will learn plenty of interesting facts about places in Paris using the Vr, you will dive into the past, play games in Vr glasses associated with each object that you will visit.

131795P1.title: Segway tour Paris
131795P1.description: Segway tours are a unique way and the funniest way to discover the most beautiful sites in the historic center of Paris. If you have always dreamed of flying on a flying carpet, a Segway ride will fill you. You will slide over the ground and sneak in an instant wherever your heart tells you in the hectic streets of Paris, and your guide will show you the most beautiful places and sights of the city.

87668P3.title: Segway Tour 120 min
87668P3.description:
Everyone already know about Segway Tours around the world , they quickly became a best seller when it came to have a safe tour around a city you want to discover , but because we are XL TOUR and always want to provide to our customers a unique experience we decided to spice up the design of our segways to bring more fun to a design that quickly became boring with ages , it results in wonderful souvenirs for everyone even for those who will cross your road .

Note: The indicative duration of the tour includes the briefing (20-30 minutes depending on the number and level of participants)

The maximum weight carried by our segway is 110Kg / 242 lbs

7842P3.title: Private Paris Photography Tour with a Professional Photographer
7842P3.description:
Come explore the enchanting streets of the most photogenic city in the world. Follow along with your professional photographer guide as you explore the most captivating angles of iconic Paris and new sites you will not soon forget. All the while, you will demystify your camera's complexities and learn how to capture the perfect shot with your own camera.

This private lesson teaches photography skills and encourages your creativity and photographic development. Whether you are just starting, a hobbyist or have years of experience, our team of professional photographers will find excellent photographic opportunities for all kinds of interests, from landmarks and people watching to hidden secrets and great views over the city. Take advantage of the one-on-one experience of our private and personalized tour to develop your own creative vision.

images.caption: There is always love in Paris

139440P1.title: Paris Electric Skateboard
139440P1.description: This Tour is animated by professionals skateboarders and snowboarders in Paris. All of our team is leaving in Paris for long years. We all share the same passion for spreading fun and stories about our wonderful and historical city : Paris.

images.caption: In 15mn we will ride on this massive double line bike lane in Central Paris

5746P33.title: Paris with Kids Custom and Private Half-Day Tour
5746P33.description:
This tour is for families who want to make sure everyone - kids and parents alike - enjoys their visit to Paris.

Your guide will be young and dynamic, and will interact well with each member of the family.

Your tour will include kid breaks that you choose: ice cream at Berthillon, or miniature sailing boats at Luxembourg gardens, or merry-go-round rides, or a Harry Potter stop etc.

Our Paris icons - Notre Dame, Eiffel the tower, Louvre, Montmartre etc. - all have great stories behind them that can speak to children as well as for adults.

And to put your program together, we will first ask you: how old are your kids? boys or girls? what do they like to do? what do they not like to do? and so on.

This is a custom-made tour, tailored to your (and your kids') interests.

images.caption: or more than one kid activity

19014P30.title: Discover Paris 180 min Segway Tour
19014P30.description: Enjoy a beautiful hassle free experience around Paris with a local guide on a Segway! Have a private tour in the city with rich history at any time you want with your friends and family! Discover Paris at a faster pace than a walking tour, and save tired legs, by choosing this fun option. Glide down the Champs-Elysées, stop for photo opportunities of the Eiffel Tower, and the Louvre, and enjoy lots of entertaining commentary along the way. Ask our local guide for some tips in Paris after this ride so your adventure would continue!

3731P202.title: Guided Eiffel Tower Climbing Experience & Optional Summit Upgrade
3731P202.description: See a different side of Paris’s ‘Iron Lady’ on a guided climbing tour of the Eiffel Tower. Take the slow and scenic route and climb the stairs! Learn all about the construction, controversies, and mystique surrounding the iconic tower from a guide as you ascend to the second level, admiring Gustave Eiffel’s intricate design from angles and viewpoints that most visitors miss. It’s an adventurous way to go behind the scenes—and under the beams—of one of the world’s most popular attractions.
